rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming space adhering to Kerala style architecture with traditional woodwork and stone details.

rooms.name: Living Room / Dining Area
rooms.description: An open area integrating both living and dining spaces featuring tiled floor patterns and built-in Kerala-style wooden seating arrangements. Natural light through large windows is optimized for Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed with modern amenities while incorporating traditional Kerala elements such as stone counters and tiled backsplash.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A quiet study/library space with ample shelving, natural lighting, and a view of the garden to promote calmness and focus.

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: Compact living space for staff designed to respect privacy while maintaining traditional Kerala aesthetics with minimalistic furnishings.

openings.description: Traditional wooden entrance door with intricate carvings and a covered porch following Vastu guidelines.
Multiple access points for functional movement between living areas and the garden, designed to balance natural light and ventilation.

garden_area.description: A large landscaped garden with native Kerala flora, water features, and pathways aligned with Vastu principles enhancing harmony and tranquility.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious bedroom featuring Kerala-style decor, en-suite bathroom, and private balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Cozy guest room with traditional elements for comfort and privacy.

rooms.name: Bathroom (shared)
rooms.description: Well-appointed bathroom area designed to complement the Kerala style aesthetics and efficient water management.

openings.description: A private balcony for relaxation with a view of the garden, ensuring proper ventilation per Vastu guidelines.
An open terrace space designed to provide natural light and air circulation throughout the living areas.

servants_access.description: Staircase connecting ground floor servant quarters with upper floor common areas, ensuring discreet access as per traditional Kerala villa layouts.
